subtitleNullable: Bulgarian news articles labelled for toxicity
descriptionNullable:
### Content

Contains information for 321 articles fetched from bulgarian news sources:

- title, text
- english translation of title, text
- a posteriori probabilities from 18 different feature sets experiments
- features generated from SOTA feature extraction techniques such as XLM, BERT, ELMO, NELA, USE and others.

### Inspiration

Dataset generated for research at [RANLP'19](http://lml.bas.bg/ranlp2019/start.php)

More info @ [GitHub](https://github.com/yoandinkov/ranlp-2019)
